conclusion: Need to analyze the flow pattern and positions of the liquid outlets to determine which container the liquid will flow into.
The outlets are labeled as E and F.
The liquid is flowing out from A, B, C, and D. The outlets E and F are positioned at the bottom of the baffles.
The liquid flows out from the outlets E and F. Since the outlets are at the bottom of the baffles, the liquid will flow directly into the containers E and F.
The liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
